ChemicalPropertyDisplayID Property

CDXML Name:ChemicalPropertyDisplayID
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_ChemicalPropertyDisplayID
CDX Constant Value:0x0BB1
Data Size:CDXObjectID
Property of objects:kCDXObj_ChemicalProperty
First written/read in:ChemDraw 9.0
Required?No

Description:

The ID of a graphical object used to display the property value.

The display object is usually a Text object.

If this property is absent:

The Chemical Property will not be associated with any display object.
